name: SynchronizationService
desc: An interface that enables entity synchronization among a group of local peers.

items.name: func owner(of: Entity) -> SynchronizationPeerID?
items.desc: Gets the device that owns a given entity, if any.

items.name: func giveOwnership(of: Entity, toPeer: SynchronizationPeerID) -> Bool
items.desc: Transfers ownership of the given entity to the named network device.

items.name: protocol SynchronizationPeerID
items.desc: A type that represents a peer among a group of networked devices.

items.name: func entity(for: Self.Identifier) -> Entity?
items.desc: Gets the entity with the given identifier.

items.name: typealias SynchronizationService.Identifier
items.desc: A type that represents a synchronization service identifier.
